programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Patagonia: The Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: Patagonia is a place of extremes  of vast ice fields and snow-capped mountains; of windswept deserts, and violent oceans. Survival here means being tough enough to cope with brutal winters, and canny enough to exploit brief seasons of plenty.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Pantanal: Brazil's Wild Heart
programme.desc: Every year the Pantanal is drowned by immense floods, and then suffer severe drought. Yet, while people struggle, the Pantanal hosts some of the greatest gatherings of animals on the planet.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Taiga: The Frozen Forest
programme.desc: Containing one third of the world's trees, the frozen forests of the Taiga are the lungs of the planet. This great forest spans across shores of the Pacific, sheltering some of the Earth's most majestic animals, and some of its most secretive.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: The Tundra: Desert of Ice
programme.desc: Covering a fifth of the earth's surface, the Arctic tundra is one of the coldest places on the planet. The piercing temperatures and powerful winds challenge even the hardiest of creatures.

programme.title: Bigger

programme.desc: Forensic Photography: Forensic photographers are among the first people at a crime scene, capturing vital clues on film. What do the cameras capture that can't be seen first-hand, and who are the men and women who analyze the camera's clues?

programme.title: The New Detectives: Face Of Tragedy
programme.desc: Forensic Sculpting: Forensic sculptors retrieve people from oblivion. Using clay and an intricate knowledge of anatomy, forensic arts place a face on an unidentified skull, recreating the victim's likeness, which often leads to his name.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay divides Hell's Kitchen between the two remaining contestants, who design a decor and a menu, then come up with names for their halves.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Twelve aspirants try to impress Gordon Ramsay, as they compete for the post of head chef at a Las Vegas restaurant.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After a disastrous opening night, both teams prepare for the next challenge; a contestant starts to succumb to the pressure; a challenge tests food-preparation skills; another chef must leave.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams prepare breakfast for men and women of the US Armed Forces dining in the kitchen, one contestant falls seriously ill and another chef has to leave.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: When the losing team is unable to identify some commonplace items in a taste-test challenge, chef Gordon Ramsay orders a grotesque taste-testing practise that turns several stomachs.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the Lead Sled Challened

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel does the unthinkable with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the journey with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel attempts to complete his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An inside look at Full Custom Garage.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian takes on a new challenge for a high-end car show.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double or Nothingness
programme.desc: Dylan is kidnapped by Nietscheans and forced to play mind games for the amusement of his captors.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Two Nietzschean siblings are in a stand-off over a weapon that can eliminate higher brain functions.

programme.title: Andromeda: Soon the Nearing Vortex
programme.desc: Tyr returns, having joined with the Collectors and demands the route of ages from his former crewmates.

programme.title: Andromeda: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.desc: A hostage situation ensues when the crew confronts Tyr.

programme.title: Andromeda: Conduit to Destiny
programme.desc: A wrong turn in the slipstream leads Andromeda to a prison riot.

programme.title: Andromeda: Machinery of the Mind
programme.desc: The Andromeda crew steps up to find out who killed a group of scientists.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken Out
programme.desc: Was Donovan Reidy deliberately run down and left to die? In 1995, 23-year-old Donovan Reidy was at a party when he got into a fight. A short while later, his bloodied body was found on the side of a major New Zealand highway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: In 1957, nine-year-old Peter Boland was on holiday having the time of his life on a remote farm in New Zealand when he simply vanished without a trace. Peter’s older brother Gavin Boland, a self-confessed sceptic, turns to Sensing Murder’s psychics.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Now You See Me
programme.desc: 26-year-old deaf woman Alexa Cullen vanished from her home in Manaia, on the Coromandel Peninsular in 1995. She had a history of hitch-hiking and police suspected she’d run away. But three years later, ominous rumors began circulating in the community.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Vanishing Point
programme.desc: In 2003, 32-year-old mother of three Sara Neithe vanished from the Hauraki Plains. Neither Sara nor her car have been seen since. Police suspect that Sara has been murdered but without a crime scene, they have been unable to advance the case.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Moorhouse Horrors / The Call Girl Killing
programme.desc: We investigate the story of David and Catherine Birnie, Australia's most sadistic husband and wife killing team, who tortured, raped and murdered four women in 1986.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Evil Heart: The Murder of Donna Wheeler
programme.desc: The bloodied, semi-naked body of 30-year-old Donna Wheeler is discovered by her estranged husband Keith Bond and 12-year-old son.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Anita Cobby Murder
programme.desc: In February 1986, nurse Anita Cobby, a former entrant in the Miss Australia quest, is walking home from Blacktown station in Sydney's outer-western suburbs. A Holden sedan pulls up and Anita is dragged into the vehicle.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Michael Kanaan: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Michael Kanaan was an angry young man in a hurry to make a name for himself in Sydney’s underworld. But his volatile temper and penchant for violence soon led him to kill three men before he was finally captured in a wild shootout with Sydney police.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Steer Trek
programme.desc: With the drought continuing, and no money to buy feed or truck in water, Claire, Tess, and Nick join forces. Like the Drovers of old, they take their amalgamated herds out on the Gungellan track.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Brave J
programme.desc: Tess motivates Claire into rekindling her dreams of becoming a stock horse trainer and breeder. There's no reason why the dream can't be pursued.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: You Can Leave Your Heart On
programme.desc: When Jodi's cooking gives five young men food poisoning, the women of Drovers must convince the Killarney men to put on a strip show.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Stripped Bare
programme.desc: When Drovers Run and then Wilgul are emptied by thieves, the Drovers Run women use Killarney as bait to trap the thieves and get their belongings back.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Blame It on the Moonlight
programme.desc: Claire is irritated over Tess's three homestay guests: they're starting to shear today, and the last thing she needs are tourists, getting in the way.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Made To Be Broken
programme.desc: Claire and Alex are finding potential clients are being put off by rumours circulated by Peter Johnson that ten years ago Alex was responsible for crippling a boy.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 5
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Phantom For the First Course
programme.desc: A renowned restaurant, The Whitney, once owned by a lumber baron in the 1800's, might still have family members hanging around its halls. Renovations and construction around the property could be behind the uprising of spirits.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Nine Men's Misery
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Cumberland Library & Monastery in Cumberland, Rhode Island where \\"the practice of silence\\" has been disturbed by a brutal past.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunting of the Garde
programme.desc: A 1920's historic theater is rumored to be haunted by one of New London's most prominent whaling families.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Do Unto Others
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: In Sickness and In Health
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If the Shirt Fits...
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cops and Criminals
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Living the Dream
programme.desc: Beat builds a lottery winner’s 7,000-sq.ft. dream home in northern Alberta. Meanwhile, Peter must beg, borrow and steal to deliver on two high profile entryways for Canada’s Winter Games.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Joint Operations
programme.desc: For the first time, camera crews are allowed inside the Foreign Operations Branch Mission, a joint partnership between US authorities and Mexican Federales.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Trap is Set
programme.desc: With dangerous threats identified and targeted, the Foreign Operations Branch and other units partner together to apprehend convicted felons and smugglers.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Panama-Colombia Confrontation
programme.desc: U.S. Navy Frigate U.S.S. Rentz is followed as its crew investigates a suspicious fishing boat in the Caribbean.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Undercover Agents
programme.desc: Tips from undercover agents lead to a high-speed chase and a shootout in Panama City. In Cartagena, Colombia, a tip leads the Armada on a wild goose chase before they track down the real smugglers.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Manhunt
programme.desc: Panamanian police go on a manhunt for a notorious gang leader trying to smuggle drugs; at the same time, the USS Rentz race to get across the Panama Canal in time to make a bust.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Engine Fail
programme.desc: The engineers on the USS Rentz must repair their ship in time. They need to go quick to catch up with suspected traffickers. Panamanian troops venture in to the remote jungle to confront a violent paramilitary army from Colombia smuggling drugs.

programme.title: Drug Wars: High-Speed Night Chase
programme.desc: The USS Rentz chase down suspected smugglers before they escape into Colombia's territorial waters. Meanwhile, the Colombian Navy and an American surveillance plane hunt down suspects off the coast of Cartagena.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Chong Chon Gang
programme.desc: Panamanian forces spend days searching a suspicious North Korean cargo ship. This ship attempts to cross the Panama Canal. The North Korean crew try to sabotage the inspection, but the Panamanians uncover something shocking.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Race for the Secret Stash
programme.desc: The Colombian Navy receive intel about a secret stash buried on islands near the port of Cartegena. It becomes a race with the traffickers to recover the drugs.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Hunting in the Dark
programme.desc: The USS Rentz hunt an elusive smuggler in the Pacific in the dead of night. Meanwhile, the Panamanian Navy go out on a routine patrol, which turns out to be anything but.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Woman
programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesn’t trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Dead Weight
programme.desc: They say opposites attract, but Betty is starting to feel weighed down by David. David is lazy and disrespectful for how broke he is all the time. Betty no longer wants to be tied down by being with someone who is always unemployed and lies about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: America says that Nathaniel’s controlling ways has taken the relationship to the point of no return. Nathaniel says she’s always flirting with other men and even coming home with a hickies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Young Love
programme.desc: Anissa and Ma’lik have been together for 9 years and they have endured a lot of heartache due to Ma’lik’s cheating and dishonesty. Ma’lik says he’s not the same man he used to be and he’s trying to keep his family together..

programme.title: Divorce Court: In and Out
programme.desc: Willard says he’s getting tired of this roller coaster ride of a relationship with Cynthia and he’s had just about as much as he can take with her lies and deception.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drank Sinatra
programme.desc: Kayla's excessive drinking along with the cheating is a deal breaker from Bryan. Bryan can no longer tolerate Kayla's alcohol-fueled tantrums. She says he is controlling and doesn't put her and her child first. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Age Ain't Nothin but a Number
programme.desc: Kelley feels Keionte's childish behavior has her considering burning their marriage license. He claims that once they married, Mommie Dearest was born and no longer wants to be her business partner! Can they figure it out before it's too late?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secret Places
programme.desc: When Leland learns that one of his clients with a reputation for stealing has lost her co-signer and could be ready to run, Dog and the crew hop a plane to the Big Island.

programme.title: Operation Repo: It Ain't No Joke!
programme.desc: In this kick-off to the final season, the cast takes viewers back through the most outrageous, comical, and memorable repos of the series. And, get a sneak peek of the final season of Operation Repo.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Intoxicated Marina Idiots
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia are on a hunt for a 2007 Porsche & a 2008 Audi from the same drug dealing debtor. Next, Matt and Froy pry a truck from a group of intoxicated idiots at a marina. And finally, Matt and Lou hit up an upscale Glendale neighborhood to...

programme.title: Operation Repo: The New Boss
programme.desc: Lou has retired, making Sonia the new boss, but will she be able to keep the company going without her big brother? Matt and Ronnie try to take a car away from a yuppie with an unusual taste for red meat.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Reclaim the Plane
programme.desc: In the premiere of the final season of Operation Repo, the team must recover an airplane and return one hundred thousand dollars. But two members of the team bail when it's time to save the company.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monk in the Trunk
programme.desc: On this premiere of Operation Repo's brand new season, Sonia's rehabilitation from her gunshot wound takes a shocking turn. The whole team runs into trouble on a job when they attempt to repossess a carnival ride from a group of wannabe carnies...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Now Serving Mrs. Pizarro
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy discuss what they will do with their severance pay once the company is sold, but have to put the discussion on hold while they repo a hovercraft golf cart from a snooty golfer.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Barbeque!
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy repo a car from an anger management meeting, Froy suffers the consequences of taking on a violent rage-aholic.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Bullseye!
programme.desc: Sonia, the new boss, is still struggling to keep the team in line, but when tragedy strikes on a routine repossession, her reign at the top faces its biggest challenge yet. Matt and Froy hit the club to take a sports car away from a deadbeat DJ.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Don't Spray Me with That
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy repossess an experimental concept motorcycle from a hose-wielding yuppie. Then, Froy and Sonia head to a casting agency to repossess a car from a two-faced receptionist with a special talent for four-letter words.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monster of a Problem
programme.desc: Sonia and Lyndah try to repossess a hot tub away from a group of upset partiers. Then, Lou and Matt try to negotiate with a pair of unintelligible and enraged parade participants. And, Lou and Lyndah must repo a car from a group of old men.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Inappropriate Website Episode
programme.desc: When Nick lands on a porn website due to a spelling error, a co-worker takes it the wrong way, forcing KAWT employees to undergo sensitivity training.

programme.title: Boomerang: Episode 1
programme.desc: New Age marketing professionals Bryson Broyer and Simone Graham look for ways to create their own paths to success while trying to renovate the legacy of their parents: The Graham Agency.

programme.title: Boomerang: Episode 2
programme.desc: Bryson tries to sell Victoria on marketing an avant-garde Black Film. Meanwhile, Simone looks for opportunities for Tia to build her brand. Bryson reclaims his power from Simone.

programme.title: Boomerang: Episode 3
programme.desc: Ari invites the gang out to a party at one of Atlanta's hottest clubs. While there, Simone tries to get Tia's new single played by a DJ. Bryson and Simone kiss for the first time ever.

programme.title: Boomerang: Episode 4
programme.desc: Simone and Bryson grapple with the fact that they may be related. Against Bryson's better judgment, Ari takes a spin at directing Tia's music video at the Atlanta Black Pride Festival.

programme.title: Boomerang: Episode 5
programme.desc: The #MeToo movement strikes home when allegations surface against Marcus Graham, closing The Graham Agency for good. In the aftermath, the squad comfort Simone and in turn, each other.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Haunted Piano
programme.desc: Ryan and the PRS team are called in when unlucky antique collectors unwittingly bring a paranormally-infested piano into their home. The team attempts to dismantle and destroy the offending instrument.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Intervention
programme.desc: Carol Ann stays awake every night taping the voices of the dead. PRS cuts their winter break short to help her curtail her obsession and close this doorway to the dead--for good.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Asylum
programme.desc: PRS explores a New York State Prison that was once a mental asylum. Ryan and his team go behind bars to uncover the institution's paranormal past and present.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Drowned
programme.desc: Kim and her family have been frightened out of their seaside Maryland home. Multiple family members have reported sightings of children with purple lips and strange noises emanating from the nearby creek.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Supernatural Seduction
programme.desc: PRS investigates the Campbell House, where the Innkeeper and guests claim to have sexual encounters with a spirit who has deep ties to a family tragedy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Carr House
programme.desc: Part of a once splendorous manor and a history that goes back as far as Robin Hood, Carr House is the sight of many a paranormal occurrence.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Hill House_PT1
programme.desc: What was once a private home before becoming a sanctuary for the elderly, the abandoned Hill House is now an eerie shadow of its former glory, that houses empty rooms, strange noises and a plethora of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Hill House_PT2
programme.desc: Part one saw the team seemingly getting stalked by something, and in this part it shows its hand.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Old Nick Theatre
programme.desc: Once a prison and a police station and now a theatre the Old Nick is famous for its unexplained occurrences. Fred decides to summon up some extra help while objects move and something wants to make itself known.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Thackray Museum
programme.desc: The medical museum houses a great many objects from its distant hospital and workhouse past with a complete Victorian street scene on the lower level.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Village Church Farm
programme.desc: A museum like no other, this small collection of antiquated buildings is said to be the home of several spirits. The team get more than they bargained for as objects move; strange noises are caught on camera and the best EVP response to date.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Hotel Of Dreams
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are bellhops at a hotel that has been given to an aimless young man by his father. They must deal with an unkind boss, an obnoxious kid and a difficult guest.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Another Song For Christmas
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark try to help a heartless used car salesman reconsider his actions on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Plane Death
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark investigate a gang of drug smugglers after an old friend of Mark's has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: One Winged Angels

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4

programme.title: World's Greatest: Capital Cities
programme.desc: With visionaries, politicians, and activists, these metropolises are defined as the official seats of government. Dublin, Washington, and Taipei share broad avenues, museums, and monuments, but are as varied as the countries they represent.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mountains
programme.desc: The earth’s fragile crust has folded and faulted, and nowhere are these natural forces more evident than in the world’s great mountains. Explore the highest peaks of the world’s terrain - the rugged realm between heaven and earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Timeless Cities & Towns
programme.desc: These cities and towns are special places where the past coexists with the present, creating cultures totally unique to their people and their part of the world and adhering to ancient traditions and while introducing modern innovations.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coral Islands
programme.desc: The reef systems that gave rise to coral islands support the vast majority of marine species on our planet, but they are under threat. Explore the delicate balance between exploiting and preserving these extraordinary natural wonders.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Nearshore Islands
programme.desc: Some of the world’s greatest islands are so close that they blend in with the mainland. But regardless of their size and origins, they are often the islands we are drawn to the most, each forging their own unique identity.

programme.title: Arthur: Postcards from Buster, Parts I & II
programme.desc: Buster's going to New York City to meet his dad Bo, and the Reads are coming with him! He's thrilled ... but won't his mom miss him? But, Bitzi gives him a present that will let him share his exciting trip with her--a video camera!

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., Queen of the Comeback/In My Africa
programme.desc: The Tibbles tease, D.W. fires back, the Tibbles taunt, D.W. has a snappy comeback, and round and round they go! Will it ever end? Then, D.W.'s new classmate, Cheikh, is Brain's young cousin…and is also from Senegal, Africa!

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Goes To Camp/Buster Makes The Grade
programme.desc: Arthur and his friends go to summer camp where it's strictly boys vs. girls. Next, Buster Baxter is everyone's favorite jokester. Unfortunately, though, Buster's grades aren't as good as his jokes, and Buster may have to repeat third grade.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: There is a virus spreading through Lakewood Elementary--it’s new nicknames and it’s changing how everyone treats each other! The playground has been quiet lately--too quiet--and the Tough Customers don't like it one bit.

programme.title: Arthur: Do You Speak George?/World Girls
programme.desc: Everyone at school is speaking their own made-up language, and George can't make sense of what anyone is saying. And it's the grand opening of World Girl World, which sells dolls from every country, and every girl in town is thrilled!

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Garden of Grief/Through the Looking Glasses
programme.desc: Buster is in charge of the community garden, but it proves to be too much for just one person. Arthur can't find his glasses and has to get new ones, but the attention he is getting from these new glasses has gone straight to his head!

programme.title: Arthur: When Carl Met George/D.W. Swims with the Fishes
programme.desc: George is excited about his new friend, Carl. Then George learns that Carl has Asperger's Syndrome – can they remain good friends? D.W. and James enter the pre-school swim meet and recruit their big siblings to coach them.

programme.title: Arthur: 1001 Dads/Prunella's Prediction
programme.desc: When Buster insists that he will miss the Father's Day picnic because he has other plans, Arthur is convinced that he's really sad and embarrassed about his parents’ divorce. And Prunella predicts a gift of flashpants, the hot new fashion.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Makes A Movie/Go To Your Room!
programme.desc: Too young to see a real "James Hound" movie, the kids decide they'll make a film of their own. Next, how would YOU like to be four years old and completely misunderstood by your parents? And then be sent to your room for ten whole minutes?

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The third episode opens with Rommel’s second offensive in North Africa.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The fourth episode sees the Germans well and truly on the retreat and the Allies are able to successfully implement operation Husky: the landing on Sicily.

programme.title: I Have Never Forgotten You
programme.desc: I Have Never Forgotten You provides an intimate portrait of famed Nazi hunter and humanitarian, Simon Wiesenthal. This rare biography looks closely at the sacrifices made by one of history's bravest and boldest.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The series begins before WWI when military commanders struggled to understand what uses aviation might have. The Wright Brothers had been the first to fly a powered aircraft in controlled flight in 1903, but even by 1914 aircraft were still underpowered.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tracie & Sammie
programme.desc: Tracie Thoms had a connection with a fan named 'Sammie' after hearing about the passing of Sammie's friend. Sammie suddenly disappeared and now Tracie is left wondering who Sammie really is?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Falesha & Jacqueline
programme.desc: Falesha's name and pictures were stolen by a fake profile that nearly ruined her life. She thought her troubles were behind her, but four years later her past comes back to haunt her.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jesse & Brian
programme.desc: Jesse met Brian online. They made plans to meet, but Brian stood her up. Now, years later, Brian has asked her to live with him. But, she can't stop wondering - what is Brian hiding? (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: While Prophet, of Grammy-nominated Nappy Roots, is making his rap career comeback, he connected online with Trinity. Prophet's ready to settle down, but is this beauty too good to be true?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Steven & Samm
programme.desc: Steven is due to graduate high school, instead of planning for college he wants to move to California for his online love, Samm. Steven's mom is sceptical of Samm's identity.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Kya & Alyx
programme.desc: In this episode we meet Kya and Alyx, who fell in love quickly after meeting online. Are they being honest with each other? Hosts Nev Schulman and Max Joseph investigate. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: The City: I'm Sorry Whit
programme.desc: When Jay finds out he's going on tour, Whitney isn't willing to give up on the relationship, but when Jay doesn't give her a choice their relationship ends in a tearful goodbye. (S1, ep12)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: And the Wall Won
programme.desc: After causing drama between Ronnie & Sammi for years, The Situation comes to blows with Ronnie. But with The Situation carried out on a stretcher, have things finally gone too far? (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Fist Pump, Pushups, Chapstick
programme.desc: Pauly D and Vinny put on a Guido-themed comedy show, while Ron and Sammi try to patch things up. Snooki is so distraught over her long-distance relationship that JWOWW and Sammi decide to intervene.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Meatball Mashup
programme.desc: S4, Ep 7. When the roommates take a trip to the Italian Shore, Snooki & Deena party so hard they wind up in bed together. Whilst back in Florence, Team Meatball has a run-in with the Italian police.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Where Is My Boyfriend?
programme.desc: The boys spring Team Meatball from the police station after their accident. And when Snooki's boyfriend Jionni comes to visit, a romantic evening ends with Snooki sobbing alone on the street.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Three Men and a Snooki
programme.desc: Deena panics after missing her period. After an all-night fight with Jionni, Snookie decides to take a break from the relationship. Mike tries to win her over, but someone else ends up comforting her.

programme.desc: Barney reminds Riff and BJ that Christmas is about more than getting gifts. Barney takes Melanie on a trip to the North Pole to deliver her letter in person.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Play for Exercise!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Sweeter Than Candy
programme.desc: Barney, Baby Bop and BJ are helping the park kids get ready for a school play. When Barney tells everyone that putting on shows began in Greece, they want to go visit! While there, they meet some friends and decide to put on a play in an amphitheatre.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney helps BJ see that we don't forget old friends when we make new ones. Ryan and his Grandpa have a great day in the Park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Squares, Squares Everywhere
programme.desc: Nick's homework is to find as many squares as he can. It's great fun when Barney and the kids help!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Parade of Bikes

programme.title: The Crime Business: The Heavy

programme.title: The Crime Business: The Fraudster
programme.desc: We look at how Nick Leeson brought down an entire bank and we uncover the crime family with a difference who raked in hundreds of thousand in insurance and benefit claims by simply pretending to be in persistent vegetative states.

programme.title: The Crime Business: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Many cons and ex-cons tell it like it is from the first few hours spent on "vomit and piss stained blankets" through a crash course in prison survival tactics. We get our faces rubbed in the sweat, blood, tears and more blood of the prison experience.

programme.title: The Crime Business: The Getaway Driver
programme.desc: We meet Jimmy 'Dixie' Deans one time Glasgow getaway driver turned pornographer who gives us the foot down details of how to out run the law and we learn about the 'multi car' strategy that the true pros employ.

programme.title: The Crime Business: The Drug Dealer
programme.desc: the drug dealer is THE growth crime role of the last decade. We plot the levels of dealing from the street round the back of your house to the hills of Columbia, learning who does what, how and what they earn.

programme.title: Vinne Jones USA Toughest Cops
programme.desc: Vinnie Jones is embedded with the New Orleans Police Department Special Operations Unit. Becoming a member of this city's famous SWAT team, Vinnie gets a unique view of life in one of the most violent and deadly places in America.

programme.title: Vinne Jones USA Toughest Cops
programme.desc: Vinnie Jones rides with the Police, the Sherriff's and the Border Patrol on their joint mission to stem the flow of drugs, guns, money and illegal immigrants passing between the USA and Mexico.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Death Trap On the Road (Schaaff Case)
programme.desc: A damaged bike belonging to Karine Schaaff, 16, is found abandoned by the side of a road in Moselle.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Evelyne Boucher Case
programme.desc: On December 9th 1987, the naked body of the young Evelyne Boucher is found near Avignon. An unprecedented investigation begins making headlines.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Honeymoon Killers (Van Beers Case)
programme.desc: Marc Van Beers, a 36-year old Brussels tax lawyer, dies in a road accident while on honeymoon. His wife Aurore is unharmed by the accident.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Deathly Fatal Passion At the Hotel (Villermet case)
programme.desc: The body of Nathalie Villermet, 46, manager of a small hotel and -restaurant, is found by a walker in the woods outside Paris, hidden under branches.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Vale´rie Bary Case)
programme.desc: On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Judgment Day

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Takedown
programme.desc: Andy and Chris accidentally screw up one of the biggest drug busts of the decade when they arrest one of the players. In an effort to save the operation, Swarek and Andy go undercover to make the drug buy.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Butterflies
programme.desc: Andy's world explodes when a fresh-faced university student is killed in a random shooting, and a bullet hits Andy, lodging in her vest.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Might Have Been
programme.desc: Everyone's living their “might-have-beens.” Andy and Gail go undercover as cocktail waitresses to clean up a drug-infested club, but get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bad Moon
programme.desc: As a full moon hangs over the city, the rookies are unnerved by a series of strange occurrences. While investigating the theft of three severed heads, Andy and Swarek pick up the trail of a mentally unstable man who has stopped taking his medication

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart & Sparks
programme.desc: As 15 Division recovers from the shooting of Det. Luke Callaghan, a series of arsons culminates in the torching of a laundromat – and the rookies are forced to confront their own burning issues.

programme.title: Patriots Day

programme.title: Unlocked

programme.title: Dinocroc vs. Supergator

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Incognito

programme.title: Relic Hunter: All Choked Up

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fire in the Sky

programme.title: The Hills' Abduction : The Zeta Reticuli Incident

programme.title: South Park: Chef's Chocolate Salty Balls

programme.title: South Park: Chickenpox

programme.title: Dr. Lisa to the Rescue

programme.title: JAG: Overdue And Presumed Lost

programme.title: JAG: Killer Instinct
programme.desc: Louis Cellucci is having a rough time aboard the flight deck of the USS Benjamin Harrison. Moments after he walks away from another failed attempt at fixing an F-14, shouts of Man Overboard! are heard across the deck.

programme.title: JAG: To Walk on Wings
programme.desc: Congresswoman Latham and a colleague watch four marine jumpers jump into the ocean from an M22 Osprey. With two marines left to jump, the plane is struck by a swell in the ocean. Harm and Mac are instructed to investigate.

programme.title: JAG: Guilt
programme.desc: When Captain Huddleston hears that the marine corporal has been charged with rape, he sends Lt. Colonel Sarah Mac MacKenzie to handle the case in a hot zone of Anti-American activity.

programme.title: JAG: Mixed Messages

programme.title: JAG: Ambush
programme.desc: Capt. Shepard leads his troop off its peacekeeping mission and into battle with the colonel of the rebel forces. Consequently, six marines die in the public incident. Harm is sent in to investigate despite a recent touch of bad luck in a string of trials.

programme.title: Random Breath Test

programme.title: COPS: Cops Mommy's Tears

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers subdue a mentally unwell man, a driver is arrested for crystal meth possession after his passengers incriminate him, and an arrested suspect apologizes to his son.

programme.title: COPS: My BFF Screwed Up

programme.desc: A paternal stepbrother attempts to shepherd his siblings along the right path in this powerful drama.

programme.title: Ishq Mein Marjawan

programme.title: The Love Boat: The Understudy / Married Singles / Lost & Found
programme.desc: A boy befriends a couple that recently lost its young son. A trainee schemes to steal Julie's job. A bickering married couple takes the cruise and stays in separate cabins...next door to each other.

programme.title: The Love Boat: Romance Roulette / The Captain's Captain / Dog's Life
programme.desc: The presence of the captain's demanding father leaves the entire crew on edge. A dog traps a passenger in his cabin. Three friends reunite on board the ship and try to meet men through an unusual game. (TV-PG)

programme.title: The Love Boat: Dear Beverly / The Strike / Special Delivery
programme.desc: An advice columnist neglects her husband to devote all her time to her fans, prompting him to seek affection elsewhere. A man with a negative history with Capt. Stubing fills in for the ailing chef.

programme.title: The Love Boat: Lonely At The Top / Silent Night / Divorce Me, Please
programme.desc: In a Christmas-themed cruise, the captain worries about how to effectively lead his ship but be a friend to his crew as well. A married couple who outwardly appear happy and in love are both desperate for the other person to give them a divorce.

programme.title: The Love Boat: The Old Man And The Runaway / A Fine Romance / The Painters
programme.desc: A crotchety old man and a teenage runaway form an unlikely friendship. Julie grows frustrated when an old friend of her brother's repeatedly rejects her advances without explanation.

programme.title: Melrose Place: Last Exit to Ohio
programme.desc: (S05E025) Kimberly's mother and Michael argue when Mrs. Shaw announces her intention to take her daughter back to Cleveland. Michael insists that Kimberly is too weak to travel.

programme.title: Melrose Place: The Dead Wives Club
programme.desc: (S05E026) Jake and Alison hit the road in the hopes of finding a place to get married. Their car breaks down in a small town, where they eventually tie the knot.

programme.title: Melrose Place: Deja Vu All Over Again
programme.desc: (S05E027) Sydney suffers broken ribs and a separated shoulder in her fall, but her pain is eased when she learns that she could receive five million dollars. Craig tells Amanda that he will take care of the lawsuit by seducing Sydney.

programme.title: Melrose Place: All Beths are Off
programme.desc: (S05E028) While having lunch with Megan, Jennifer hears Kyle's voice. She slaps him. Kyle visits her at the beach house and apologizes for the way he broke off their Boston affair.

programme.title: Melrose Place: Ultimatums and the Single Girl
programme.desc: (S05E029) Amanda and Kyle seek divorces so that their spouses can't get a cut of the jazz club. Sydney decides to give up her lawsuit for a $50,000 settlement because she doesn't want to hurt Craig.

programme.desc: Frustrated by his boss blaming him for burning his mouth on hot soup, Timmy has a special spoon created for Russell. Audrey's plan backfires when she tries to seduce Jeff in the bedroom in order to get him to complete household tasks.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections

programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr and Mrs Sabatini have asked Bob to convert a local house into a delicatessen. Unfortunately for Roley, there is no rolling to be done. The gang leaves to get on with the job and Roley decides to tag along just in case.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is rendering a wall for Mr Sabatini. The job is straightforward, but the finished result looks rather plain, so Bob offers to get some tiles from JJ’s yard to decorate it. While Bob is gone, Mr Sabatini demonstrates his soccer skills to Dizzy.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s Mr and Mrs Bentley’s twenty fifth wedding anniversary and to celebrate Mr Bentley asks Bob and the gang to build a special summer house. Mrs Bentley is out for the day and the summer house is to be a surprise.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building an extraordinary new cave-house for Sandy Beach – a caveman expert who’s moving to the valley to study how cavemen used to live. The team are all head into the mountains.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: There is great excitement at Bob’s yard when his new metal detector is delivered. He plans to use it to find a burst pipe in Farmer Pickles’ field, and promises Muck that afterwards they will hunt for buried treasure.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s a blistering hot day on Sunflower Valley. Bob and Wendy have got to finish building their workshop – making the workbenches and installing the power tools – it’s an inside job so the machines all get the day off.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: An observation tower is going to be added next to the Visitor’s centre to provide a scenic view of Sunflower Valley. The scaffolding is raised and Roley prepares a path to connect the tower to the Dome.

programme.title: Skyscrapers and Car Parks
programme.desc: Join Bob on his next visit On Site! Follow Bob and the team as they take us through the construction of skyscrapers & car parks. Learn how skyscrapers are built up high on strong foundations and see how lifts are needed to carry people to the top.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Pam Goody is running out of money to complete the Arts Centre renovations and Molly suggests holding a fashion show to raise funds. Pam thinks this a wonderful idea and asks Molly to organise it. Bob is, of course, just the man to build a catwalk.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Scrambler tells Spud that Bob is putting together the machinery for Farmer Pickles’ sunflower oil factory, he decides that putting things together is something he’d be very good at. So he heads off to the factory to lend a hand.

programme.title: Mutant X

programme.desc: When Street solves the 8th dimension of Ma'el's riddle, a beacon leads Liam to a chamber with a healing pool. However, there is only enough in the healing pool to help 6 Taelons. Zo'or will do anything to insure his own life.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Truth
programme.desc: Boone tries to find out who murdered his wife.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Avatar
programme.desc: Boone and Marquette must find James Pike, a mysterious escaped serial killer who rose from the dead.

programme.title: The Lost World: Stranded
programme.desc: The group saves Chief Jacoba's daughter Assai from the Ape men earning them safe passage home through his caves. But Marguerite's greed causes the cave to collapse on itself.

programme.title: The Lost World: More Than Human
programme.desc: The adventurers are captured by a reptilian race in a land where humans are at the bottom of the hierarchy. They come across other enslaved humans and rally them to help fight back.

programme.title: The Lost World: Nectar
programme.desc: To retrieve an antidote that will save professor Summerlee from deadly venom, the explorers must venture into a bee hive that no human has ever made it out of alive.

programme.title: The Lost World: Cave of Fear
programme.desc: Professor Challenger is taken hostage. To save him, the group, goes into the cave of fear to retrieve bones for a ritual offering. In the process, they revisit the dark corners of their past.

programme.title: The Lost World: Salvation

programme.title: The Lost World: Blood Lust

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Thomas Plant gets to ride in a special classic car and Philip Serrell has his eye on a unique lady, as they make their way through the Peak District.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Catfish UK: Rob & Sarah
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Nathan Henry to help Rob track down his soulmate, Sarah. After two and a half years, Sarah has suddenly gone quiet and it's up to Oobah and Nathan to investigate. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Trouble And Paradise
programme.desc: Chloe turns 18 but rows with Jordan on her big night out. Meanwhile, Megan and Dylan travel to Spain, Mia confronts Maggie, and Amber gets ready for the Christening - but there are tears. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Outfits, Arguments And Ultimatums
programme.desc: Chloe and Jordan go to Spain, but love stays at home. Amber rows with Ste, Mia spends Father's Day in a huff, Dylan hates Megan's 18th birthday outfit and Naomi gives Raphael an ultimatum. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: It's All Over
programme.desc: There's more drama in store for the teen mums as Mia faces off with Erin, Amber and Ste try counselling, Chloe and Jordan take a break and Megan and Dylan's engagement party ends in tears. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: The Future's Bright
programme.desc: Megan wants a new baby, Mia has her first night out since Marliya was born and Chloe makes a decision about Jordan. Naomi gets mad when an unexpected guest shows up at Kya's party. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Loved to Death
programme.desc: An investigation into the rise of violence surrounding relationship breakups among adolescents, as detailed in the story of Wayland, Massachusetts teen Lauren Astley, whose last encounter with her football player ex-boyfriend proved to be fatal

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in the Fast Lane
programme.desc: A report on the March 1988 murder of legendary racecar driver Mickey Thompson and his wife Trudy. Thompson’s sister is convinced that Michael Goodwin, her brother’s former partner, was the killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Crime and Punishment
programme.desc: Two women fight to keep the man convicted of killing their mother over 20 years earlier in prison, though he maintains his innocence.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Long Island Serial Killer
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance of Shannan Gilbert, near Gilgo Beach, New York. The search for Shannan led to the discovery of a total of ten bodies in the scrub brush of Gilgo Beach, leading police to suspect the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Secrets, Lies and Alibis
programme.desc: John and Susan Sutton were sleeping in separate rooms in their Florida home, when a gunman entered their house and shot both of them several times. Susan was killed, but John survived. Nothing was taken from the house, proving the murder premeditated.

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Catch a Stalker
programme.desc: Fifteen-year-old Penny Chang of Shaker Heights, Ohio was stalked and killed by her older brother’s best friend, 21-year-old Scott Strothers.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: F.B.I. Agent Dale Cooper comes to the logging town of Twin Peaks to investigate the murder of Laura Palmer, a beautiful and popular high school student. While investigating, Agent Cooper slowly learns that strange things are happening.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: James saves the girls from a tormented Harold. Cooper brings Audrey home. Bobby and Shelly learn that their insurance plans have backfired. Donna tries to convince Truman that Harold Smith has Laura's secret diary.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper and the One-Armed Man inspect guests at the Great Northern. Hawk finds Harold Smith dead by his own hand…with a mysterious suicide note and the diary torn to shreds. Leo speaks to Bobby about "new shoes."

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Donna and James wonder why Maddy left so suddenly. Norma's mother arrives with news…she's married a new man, Ernie Niles. Cooper tells Leland they arrested Ben Horne for Laura's murder.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Albert returns to examine Maddy. Cooper asks for twenty-four hours to finish his case. James and Donna reaffirm their love. Andy accidentally leads Donna and Cooper back to Mrs. Tremond's house.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Leland is laid to rest and Sarah Palmer tries to accept all that has happened to her family. Dr. Jacoby returns from Hawaii. Cooper prepares to leave Twin Peaks. Mayor Milford objects to his brothers engagement to a younger woman.
